summary: The story of events leading up to the 1980 Gwangju massacre in South Korea when thousands of students and protesters were killed by armed troops during an anti-government demonstration.
cast: Sang-kyung Kim|Yo-won Lee|Sung-Ki Ahn|Tae-won Kwon|Lee Joon-Gi|Jae-ho Song|Bong-gi Baek|Jong-hak Baek|Lee Chang-min|Jae-Hwan Choi|Eom Hyo-Seob|In-gi Jeong|Jeong-Ah Jeong|Cheol-gi Kim|Ji-hoon Kim|Byeong-hyeon Lee|Eol Lee|Hyun-sung Lim|Myeong-gyu|Moon-hee Na|Chang-Suk Oh|Cheol-min Park|Yong-soo Park|Byung-ho Son|Park Won-Sang|Jin-Ha Yoon
title: Hwa-ryeo-han-hyoo-ga
